word_mean_info__list.difference: 多指在别人不注意或不知道的情况下偶然听到谈话的内容。
通常指用仪器设备偷听别人的谈话内容。
指在室内等处安装窃听器以窃听他人的谈话内容。

bilingual.source: The image on the monitor is very clear.
bilingual.target: 监视器上的画面非常清晰。

bilingual.source: The heart monitor pulsed on the screen.
bilingual.target: 心脏监视器在屏幕上脉冲。
监视器显示了实时的交通状况。

bilingual.source: He installed a monitor in his office.
bilingual.target: 他在办公室里安装了一个监视器。

bilingual.source: We need a new monitor to improve work efficiency.
bilingual.target: 我们需要一个新的监视器来提高工作效率。

bilingual.source: The doctor observed the patient's heart rate through the monitor.
bilingual.target: 医生通过监视器观察病人的心率。

bilingual.source: The patient's heart showed an oscillatory rhythm on the monitor.
bilingual.target: 患者的心脏在监视器上显示出振荡节律。

bilingual.source: The steady heartbeat on the monitor was reassuring to the family.
bilingual.target: 监视器上稳定的心跳对家人来说是令人安心的。

bilingual.source: How long until the monitor powers down.

list.abstract: monitor（英[ˈmɒnɪtə]，美[ˈmɑːnɪtər]），英语单词，作名词用，意思为监控器；监听器；监视器，作动词用，意思为检测；监测；监控。短语搭配有monitor system（监控系统），例句为“Monitor their children's watching of TV programs.（监督他们的孩子看电视节目。）” monitor名词类近义词有detectophone、invigilator。

yingyinNormal.en: Son, I'd like to offer you a place in our program. But you took away my monitor.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想在我们的项目中给你一席之地。可是你们取走了我的监控器。

yingyinNormal.en: I was the cafeteria monitor. I saw potatoes not where potatoes are supposed to be.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是餐厅监察员，我看到他们把土豆扔到了不该扔的地方。

yingyinNormal.en: You see those readouts? We can monitor your vital signs from anywhere on the planet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看到那些参数了吗？无论在哪我们都能监测到你的信号。

yingyinNormal.en: The final step in our evaluation is always to see what happens when the monitor's removed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 评估的最后一步，都是要看看监控器取走后你们的反应。

yingyinNormal.en: And as a moderator, you monitor the topic threads, and shut down accounts of abusive users?
yingyinNormal.zh: 作为一名网管，你负责监控头条话题并有权将恶意谩骂用户进行封号是吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Listen, boys. You sold me on a home computer. That's a keyboard and monitor. This is a board.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听着，孩子们，你们卖给我的家用电脑，得有键盘和显示器，这只是电路板

yingyinNormal.en: You must have used a false name at the clinic and their tests probably tripped the monitor to your gene print.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在诊所用的肯定是假名，他们的检查泄漏了你的基因讯息。

yingyinNormal.en: We're working quickly to track and monitor anyone who may have been in close contact with someone showing symptoms.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们也正在迅速投入工作，跟踪和监控任何可能长时间接触到已经表现出症状人的人们。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh. We select the securities that go into the CDO portfolio and monitor the assets. I do most of Merrill Lynch's CDOs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是吗，我们选择加入债务担保组合的有价证券同时监控这些资产，美林证券公司的债务担保多由我负责。

yingyinNormal.en: As loud as these two are, the move like cats. I heard everything on the baby monitor. How can you say these things about my sister?
yingyinNormal.zh: 她俩嗓门这么大，走路倒是没声音。我在婴儿监听器里都听到了，你怎么能那样说我的妹妹？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, they could monitor scientific publications and see if anyone posts such a cogent restatement in the next couple of months. If so, the authors are most likely in possession of my stolen laptop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这样他们就可以监控科学出版社看看有没有其他人在未来的几个月内寄给他们这类重述，如果有，该作者就很有可能偷了我的笔记本电脑。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: watch and check a situation carefully for a period of time in order to discover something about it

examination_example.sentence: It gives the Western Association of Fish and Wildlife Agencies (WAFWA) the job of <highlight>monitoring</highlight> progress.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它赋予了西部鱼类和野生动物机构协会(WAFWA)监督进展的任务。

sense_info_list.en: listen to and report on (a foreign radio broadcast or telephone conversation); maintain regular surveillance over

exam_freq_info.chinese: 监听; 监控; 监听者

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: watch and check a situation carefully for a period of time in order to discover something about it

examination_example.sentence: Robots are currently under a two-year trial in Wales which will train "farm bots" to herd, <highlight>monitor</highlight> the health of livestock.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 机器人目前正在威尔士接受为期两年的试验，将训练“农场机器人”放牧、监测牲畜的健康状况。

examination_example.sentence: That includes tagging the foxes and <highlight>monitoring</highlight> their numbers to ensure nothing goes wrong.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这包括标记狐狸并监控狐狸的数量，以确保一切正常。

examination_example.sentence: The extreme isolation of these massive farms leaves them often unattended, and <highlight>monitored</highlight> only once or twice a year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些大型农场与人隔绝，往往无人看管，每年只监测一两次。

examination_example.sentence: The robots are not limited to herding and <highlight>monitoring</highlight> livestock.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 机器人的作用不仅限于放牧和监视牲畜。

examination_example.sentence: The robots have provided major benefits to farmers in various ways, from hunting and pulling weeds to <highlight>monitoring</highlight> the condition of every single fruit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 机器人以各种方式为农民提供了巨大利益，包括从打猎和拔草到监测每一种水果的状况。

sense_info_list.zh: 监听; 监控; 监听者

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Monitor</highlight> their children's watching of TV programs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 监督他们的孩子看电视节目。

examination_example.sentence: Finally, relevant regulatory authorities should also strictly <highlight>monitor</highlight> the behavior of pop stars and ensure that they set good examples for teenagers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最后，相关监管部门还应严格监控流行音乐歌星的行为，确保他们为青少年树立良好榜样。

examination_example.sentence: To investigate, Twinge and her colleagues dived into the "<highlight>Monitoring</highlight> the Future" data set based on annual surveys of American school students.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了进行调查，Twinge 和她的同事们对学生进行年度调查，并且潜入了“监测未来”数据集。

sample.mean: n. 预兆；告诫；警告；诫谕

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指在室内等处安装窃听器以窃听他人的谈话内容。
通常指用仪器设备偷听别人的谈话内容。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 监听; 监控; 监听者

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: watch and check a situation carefully for a period of time in order to discover something about it

examination_example.sentence: They installed a camera to <highlight>monitor</highlight> sheep activity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们安装了一台摄像机来监视绵羊的活动。

examination_example.sentence: Zoo officials said during this pregnancy, she was closely <highlight>monitored</highlight> through physical exams and blood tests.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 动物园的官员说，在怀孕期间，通过进行体检和血液检查，她受到密切监测。

examination_example.sentence: It has been trying out <highlight>monitoring</highlight> stations that are intended to yield minute-to-minute maps of outdoor air pollution.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它一直在试行监测站，以绘制出每分钟的室外空气污染图。

sense_info_list.zh: 监听; 监控; 监听者

examination_example.sentence: Last year's car-free day showed a 40 percent drop in pollution levels in some parts of the city, according to an independent air pollution <highlight>monitor</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据一项独立空气污染监测显示，去年无车日该市部分地区的污染水平下降了40%。

examination_example.sentence: Use <highlight>monitoring</highlight> equipment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 使用监控设备。

sample.mean: n. 预兆；告诫；警告；诫谕
adj. 警告的；申斥的

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 警告, 提醒

word_usage.usage: 在表示一种职务，在句中作表语、补语时，前面不加冠词：We elected him monitor of our class. 我们选他当我们的班长。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指在室内等处安装窃听器以窃听他人的谈话内容。
通常指用仪器设备偷听别人的谈话内容。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: watch and check a situation carefully for a period of time in order to discover something about it

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Monitor</highlight> the quality of grass.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 监测草的质量。

examination_example.sentence: It will use cameras and sensors to <highlight>monitor</highlight> the animals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它将使用摄像机和传感器来监控动物。

examination_example.sentence: The quality of grassland will be tracked by <highlight>monitoring</highlight> the shape, color and texture of grass.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过监测草地的形状、颜色和质地来跟踪草地的质量。

examination_example.sentence: Fish and Wildlife Service carefully <highlight>monitors</highlight> and manages the wolf packs in Yellowstone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 鱼类和野生动物管理局在黄石公园对狼群进行了仔细的监控和管理。

word_usage.usage: 在表示一种职务，在句中作表语、补语时，前面不加冠词：We elected him monitor of our class. 我们选他当我们的班长。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指在室内等处安装窃听器以窃听他人的谈话内容。
通常指用仪器设备偷听别人的谈话内容。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: —Oh, he is Wang Wei, our <highlight>monitor</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 哦，他是王伟，我们的班长。

examination_example.sentence: Our <highlight>monitor</highlight> Jenny is so organized that she always keeps things in good order.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的班长珍妮很有条理，她总是把事情安排得井井有条。

examination_example.sentence: She once chose our <highlight>monitor</highlight> as the most helpful student.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她曾经选我们的班长为最有帮助的学生。

examination_example.sentence: He held that job for four years and then worked his way up to being a school safety <highlight>monitor</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在那份工作上干了四年，后来努力成为一名学校安全监察员。

sample.mean: n. 预兆；告诫；警告；诫谕
adj. 警告的；申斥的

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 警告, 提醒
